alert.note: Alert for Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 5:59PM CDT until May 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Greenwood County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Severy, or 10 miles south of Eureka, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Eureka, Severy, Climax, Eureka City Lake, Fall River Lake, Eureka Airport, Piedmont and Fall River State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
